mapper.insert: insert into seckill (goods_id, seckill_price, seckill_num, seckill_begin, seckill_end) VALUES (#{goodsId}, #{seckillPrice}, #{seckillNum}, #{seckillBegin},#{seckillEnd})
mapper.select: SELECT s.*,g.* FROM seckill s JOIN goods g ON s.goods_id = g.id WHERE seckill_id = #{seckillId}
